message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $120. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. How about $160?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $140?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still think $140 is a bit low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $160, so how about $150?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
